DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether exercise improve health well-being cancer survivor . We also want know health well caregiver .
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot feasibility study refine methodology large Phase II trial .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Cancer Survivors : Have diagnosis cancer ( cancer type exclude squamous basal cell skin cancer ) receive surgery , chemotherapy , and/or radiation therapy within last 112 month . Have functional capacity rating 70 great Karnofsky Performance Scale rating 1 0 ECOG scale assess medical oncologist ( physician designee ) follow cancer treatment Have caregiver willing participate int study Be able read English Be 21 year age older Give write informed consent Inclusion Criteria Caregivers : Be nominate cancer survivor Be able read English Be 21 year age older Give write informed consent physical limitation ( e.g . cardiorespiratory , orthopedic ) contraindicate participation low moderate intensity home base walk progressive resistance program , assess medical oncologist , primary care physician , and/or study medical monitor . For caregiver , currently undergo active treatment cancer
